name: D4L
description: '''D4L''' (an acronym of '''Down for Life''') was an American [[hip hop music|hip hop]] group formed in 2003, composed of [[Atlanta]]-based [[rapper]]s Fabo, Mook-B, Stoney, and [[Shawty Lo]]. They are best known for their 2005 hit single "[[Laffy Taffy (song)|Laffy Taffy]]", which peaked at number one on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] in January 2006.
